channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘It Was Nuts’: The Extreme Tests that Show Why Hail Is a Multibillion-Dollar Problem
item.description: The costs of a hail damage have ballooned over the past two decades, prompting researchers to resort to extreme measures to understand how these storm...

item.title: Kids and Teen Influencers in Australia Say ‘Bye-Bye’ to Social Media
item.description: Starting Wednesday, Australia will prohibit kids under 16 from using social platforms. For youth content creators, it means logging off or finding cre...

item.title: Naya Create Review: A Split Keyboard That Just Doesn’t Work
item.description: A beautifully designed split keyboard that seems utterly determined not to work.

item.title: Unconventional AI confirms its massive $475M seed round
item.description: Led by Naveen Rao, the former head of AI at Databricks, the new hardware startup is valued at $4.5 billion.

item.title: 17 Best Gifts for Men, Manly Men, and Menly Man Men (2025)
item.description: When you need something that's as mannishly masculinized as you can get for the Man™ in your life, we have you covered.

item.title: Meesho’s $606M IPO pops as enthusiasm for India’s e-commerce startups rises
item.description: Meesho had a good first day as a public company, with its shares climbing as much as 46% from its issue price as investors jumped to grab a piece of t...

item.title: Fertility startup Inito wants to use AI-designed antibodies to expand at-home health tests
item.description: Inito has raised $29 million in new funding to invest in and develop AI-engineered antibodies that will help it offer new types of tests and improve t...

item.title: Google invests in Fervo’s $462M round to unlock even more geothermal energy
item.description: Fervo Energy's Series E round will help the company build additional phases of its Cape Station power plant while beginning development on new sites.

item.title: CoreWeave CEO defends AI circular deals as ‘working together’
item.description: The CEO of the AI data center provider, which has Nvidia as an investor and a supplier, described the environment as a "violent change" in demand.

item.title: Scientists Thought Parkinson’s Was in Our Genes. It Might Be in the Water
item.description: Parkinson’s disease has environmental toxic factors, not just genetic.
